text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the English court can allow the tribunal to revoke its injunction under Section 44(6) of the Arbitration Act 1996. It does not mention Section 44(6) at all, which deals with the court's power to revoke or vary an order previously made by the tribunal, or vice versa.
